rdf:Description.dc:title: Students of native ancestry in Alberta : public post-secondary institutions 1991 public post-secondary institutions.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Advanced Education. Program Coordination Branch.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Alberta Advanced Education, Program Coordination Branch,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Summary of programs, services, funding and facilities available in Alberta to students of native (Indian, Metis, Inuit) ancestry, in colleges, universities, vocational schools and other post-secondary institutions, both on and off reserve.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Indians of North America
